Description:
Detects disabling of system firewalls which could be used by adversaries to bypass controls that limit usage of the network.

Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Disable System Firewall
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where type = 'service_stop' and (unit = 'firewalld' or unit = 'iptables' or unit = 'ufw')
